```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(RSQLite)

tidy_finance <- dbConnect(
  SQLite(),
  "data/tidy_finance.sqlite",
  extended_types = TRUE
)

DBI::dbListTables(tidy_finance)

## Create CRSP Dummy Data

crsp_monthly <- tbl(tidy_finance, "crsp_monthly") |> 
  collect()

beta <- tbl(tidy_finance, "beta") |> 
  collect()


## Create Compustat Dummy Data

compustat <- tbl(tidy_finance, "compustat") |> 
  collect()

compustat |> 
  filter(year == 2019) |> 
  drop_na()

tibble(
  gvkey = seq(1:1000)
)
```
